venue.address_2: same building as Head Games-If Free street door is locked-go around corner to entrance on Oak St.
venue.name: The Landing Center for Healing Arts

item.description:
HO HO HA HA HA! Come experience the fun of Laughter Yoga.

Join us for an hour of breathing, fun, and laughter. Through the practice of Laughter Yoga, we use laughter as exercise. You do not have to be in a good mood, find anything funny, or have a sense of humor. You only have to being willing to laugh for no reason!

Come learn what people are buzzing about with this new wellness approach.

You will leave feeling lighter, more grounded, and energized!

Come dressed comfortably. No mat or experience needed.

$15 or FREE if it is your first time at the Landing Center.
Any ? Call Katie 207 239 8667
or email katie@katiewestlifedesign.com
item.name: A Fun-Filled Hour of Laughter!
